attributes.action: bring the armed forces salaries into line with that of the emergency services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the armed forces have for a long time now been on far less than emergency services, when the fire strikes were on who was called in ! who was used for recent evacuations during the floods , and distribution of water ! the same people who are putting their lives on the line every day they set foot outside the wire in iraq or afghanistan!
